tool_description: Returns a collection of data from sports API.
name: Sports Data API
title: Sports Data API

api_list.name: NCAA Football Endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-data-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/sports/ncaaf/events"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-data-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: NCAA College Football Stats
